VENDORID.description: Short name of vendor (25 characters max in Access). Used as foreign key in ITEMVENDOR_TBL.

VENDORNAME.description: Full display name of vendor (50 characters max in Access).

REGION.description: 15-character region code where vendor is located for filtering and proximity logic.

REGIONLONG.description: Full name of region (255 characters max) for display and localization.

unavailableSince.description: Date this vendor was marked inactive. Preserves audit trail; replaces boolean ACTIVE.
